statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_tasks;
SELECT task_name, location FROM delivery_tasks WHERE availability = true;
SELECT task_id, task_name, location FROM delivery_tasks ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_tasks WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT task_name, driver_id FROM delivery_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM delivery_tasks WHERE driver_id = 100 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_tasks WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY location ASC, task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, location FROM delivery_tasks ORDER BY location, task_id;
SELECT task_id, task_name, location FROM delivery_tasks WHERE driver_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM delivery_tasks WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' OR location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT name, location FROM drivers WHERE availability = true;
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE driver_id = 1001;
SELECT driver_id, name FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT name, location FROM drivers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT task_description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT name, location, availability FROM drivers NATURAL JOIN tasks;
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM tasks GROUP BY driver_id HAVING total_tasks > 2;
SELECT * FROM Tasks;
SELECT task_desc, task_location FROM Tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_desc, task_location FROM Tasks WHERE task_status='pending';
SELECT driver_name, driver_location FROM Drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_availability FROM Drivers WHERE driver_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_desc, task_location FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_location DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_location FROM Drivers WHERE driver_availability = TRUE;
SELECT task_desc, task_location, task_status FROM Tasks INNER JOIN Assignments ON Tasks.task_id = Assignments.task_id WHERE assign_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT task_desc, driver_name FROM Tasks INNER JOIN Assignments ON Tasks.task_id = Assignments.task_id INNER JOIN Drivers ON Assignments.driver_id = Drivers.driver_id WHERE driver_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_location FROM drivers;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date, task_id, driver_id FROM assignments;
SELECT driver_id, availability_date, available FROM availability;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_location FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_location FROM tasks WHERE task_location = 'CityA';
SELECT driver_name, task_name, assignment_date FROM drivers JOIN assignments ON drivers.driver_id = assignments.driver_id ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT driver_name, availability_date, available FROM drivers JOIN availability ON drivers.driver_id = availability.driver_id WHERE available = true ORDER BY availability_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers
SELECT driver_name, location FROM drivers WHERE available = TRUE
SELECT task_description FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC
SELECT city, state FROM locations WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT driver_name, location, available FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT task_description, task_location FROM tasks ORDER BY task_location DESC
SELECT city, state FROM locations WHERE state='California'
SELECT driver_name, location FROM drivers JOIN daily_schedule ON drivers.driver_id = daily_schedule.driver_id
SELECT task_description, rating FROM tasks JOIN ratings ON tasks.task_id = ratings.task_id
